ValidationRule.description: Validation to ensure Demo fields are filled in if the Demo Needed checkbox is checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Demo_Needed__c , OR(ISBLANK(TEXT( Demo_Type__c )) , ISBLANK(TEXT( Primary_Demo_Scenario__c )) , ISBLANK( Demo_Due_Date__c ) , ISBLANK( Demo_Description__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When a Demo is needed, you must provide a Demo Type, Primary Demo Scenario, Demo Due Date and Demo Description. Please fill in missing information to save.
